description.en: "I didn't even know what had hurt me." Min Jiho, a former second-tier idol, ended his idol career, leaving only confusion in his heart. Planning to leave the entertainment industry entirely, Jiho unexpectedly encounters his idolized top actor, Kang Taeyeon, during a variety show as a substitute. This leads him to become embroiled in a light scandal...

title.en: Seitokai ni mo Ana wa Aru!

altTitles.ja: 生徒会にも穴はある!

altTitles.en: There is Also a Hole in the Student Organization!
Even the Student Council has Holes

altTitles.vi: Hội học sinh cũng lắm trò vui!

description.en: When it comes to the face of this student organization, it's a little weird, like a fool, scary, or moody. However, mysterious and futuristic days that seem strangely cute pass by.
description.ja: この生徒会の面子ときたら、あほの子だったり、恐ろしかったり、むっつりだったり、ちょっと変！ でも、それがなんだか、妙に可愛く思える今日この頃……。

title.en: Kimi to Ikirareru Nara Shindemo Ii

altTitles.ja: 君と生きられるなら死んでもいい

description.en:
"I can't remember someone important who was always beside me."

Houri, who lives a very ordinary life, is drawn to a crosswalk and almost gets run over by a truck, but is saved by a man who passes by.
The moment he sees the man's face, he has flashbacks of him past life, when the two of them were intimate.
The two are led by a super-powerful fate to make love, but the next morning, the man declares that he doesn't remember Houri...!?
A story of love that returns until death do them part.

“Why do you keep asking if we’re dating? We’re just holding hands, we’re not dating!!”
It’s a slice-of-life romantic comedy about couples who aren’t really couples!
description.id:
Sebuah karya baru dari author Webtoon Character Na Kang Lim

“Kenapa kamu terus tanya kalau kita pacaran? Kita cuma bergandengan tangan, kita nggak pacaran!!”

description.en: Sequel to Blood Rain (Min)

After her parents divorced, Lu Yang moved into her mother's good friend's house and began living with the friend's daughter, Su Gui. Su Gui is smart and gentle, like the warm sun in winter, kind yet unobtrusive. She illuminates Lu Yang's life and shines into Lu Yang's heart. Lu Yang saw her as a sister, a friend, and a mother figure... Later on, Lu Yang didn't want to be her little sister anymore, she wanted to date her. However, after realizing that her feelings for Su Gui had changed, Lu Yang did not want to ruin their current relationship. She was afraid to lose her identity as "little sister". She had to change her dependence on Su Gui and distance herself. But after reuniting with Su Gui at work, the suppressed feelings bloomed like a rose, tightly binding Lu Yang and Su Gui together. Was it a long-term scheme or destiny?...

altTitles.vi: Bị Che Khuất Bởi Ánh Mặt Trời Lặn
Tà dương trong đôi mắt vô hồn

altTitles.ru: Закат, отражённый в её ледяном взгляде

description.en:
The witch Hildegar, who received the blessing of the Sun Goddess Karia, is known far and wide for her fearsome reputation.  
The Northerner Elkin, who lost his homeland, chases after the witch towards a nameless castle…
description.ko:
태양의 신 카리야의 가호를 받은 마녀 '힐데가르'.
고향을 잃은 북부인 '에르킨'은 마녀를 쫓아 이름 없는 성으로 향한다.

title.en: Isekai de Skill wo Kaitai Shitara Cheat na Yome ga Zoushoku Shimashita: Gainen Kousa no Structure

altTitles.ja: 異世界でスキルを解体したらチートな嫁が増殖しました 概念交差のストラクチャー

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai de Skill o Kaitai Shitara Cheat na Yome ga Zoushoku Shimashita Gainen Kousa no Structure

altTitles.en: Being Able to Edit Skills in Another World I Gained OP Waifus

altTitles.ko: 이세계에서 스킬을 해체했더니 치트인 신부가 증가했습니다

altTitles.zh: 在异世界解体技能后开挂新娘增加了

altTitles.zh-hk: 在異世界解體技能後開掛新娘增加了
以我的能力創造開外掛的老婆們

altTitles.fr: En pouvant éditer les skills dans un autre monde, j'ai gagné une femme surpuissante

altTitles.ru: Мои невесты из другого мира стали сверхсильными: скрещивание скиллов

description.en:
***A harem cheat fantasy with super-enhanced slaves!***  
  
When an entire bus of people was summoned to another world, Souma Nagi doesn't go along with the idea of being a Hero like the rest. Thus he leaves the palace and starts his life in another world with his ability to restructure skills. This is the first time I've ever been to a game where I've been able to do that & the first time I've ever seen a story about a girl who is a slave, a wife, and a cheat!
description.ja: 異世界に召喚されたきっかけで特殊なスキルを手に入れた主人公・ナギ。今ではこのおかげで、ハーレムな毎日を過ごしています!?
description.pt:
Quando um ônibus cheio de pessoas é invocado para outros mundo, Nagi Souma não segue a ideia de ser um herói como os outros. E assim ele deixa o palácio e começa sua vida num outro mundo com sua habilidade de reestruturar habilidades.  
  


---

title.en: The Dang Clan’s Swordmaster Heir Just Wants a Normal Life

altTitles.en: Becoming the Swordmaster Rank Young Lord of the Sichuan Tang Family
He Became the Head of the Four Heavenly Dang Family
Becoming the Sacheon Dang's Swordsmaster-Rank Young Lord
Became a swordsman-level Sogami of the Sacheondang family

description.en: The Dang clan of Sacheon, once renowned for its poison and hidden weapons, is now on the path to its demise. That is, until Yeonmyeung Dang, an outcast boy of the clan, awakens by recollecting the memories of his past life as the 'god of swords' who devoted his life to mastering the sword. Will the boy be able to protect his family and fulfill his dream of living a normal life?
description.ko:
독과 암기의 명가였지만 지금은 몰락해버린 사천당가.
그곳에서 태어난 당연명은 문득 검에 미쳐 살며
검신의 경지에 이르렀던 전생을 각성한다.

'이번 생은 평범하게 살고 싶다.'

평범하게 살려면, 역시 검술 실력은 숨겨야겠지.
그런데 방해하는 것들이 너무 많다.

altTitles.ja: 滄元図〜最強神魔になる道〜

description.en: Meng Chuan witnessed his mother killed before his eyes, so he trained very hard hoping to one day avenge her death. But his peaceful days were broken as his wedding engagement being called off, an invasion by foreign forces, the sanctuary fallen into enemy hands… In order to protect the people of Ning City, he picked up his sword and vowed to be the strongest. This is a heavy responsibility and a long journey…
description.id: Meng Chuan menyaksikan ibunya terbunuh di depan matanya, jadi dia berlatih sangat keras berharap suatu hari bisa membalas kematiannya. Tapi hari-harinya yang damai hancur ketika pertunangan pernikahannya dibatalkan, sebuah invasi oleh pasukan asing, tempat perlindungan jatuh ke tangan musuh... Untuk melindungi orang-orang Kota Ning, ia mengambil pedangnya dan bersumpah untuk menjadi yang terkuat. Ini adalah tanggung jawab yang berat dan perjalanan yang panjang...

title.en: Watashi wo Center ni suru to Chikaimasu ka?

altTitles.ja: 私をセンターにすると誓いますか？

altTitles.en: Do You Swear to Center Me?

description.en:
"If you really can make me the center of the group... I'll marry you."

Mizuki Natsuno is the least popular member of the idol group "Melty Strawberry." Koichi Okuda is the only person in the world who continues to support Mizuki. Two people who should never be connected, end up in a cooperative relationship under one roof, working her way up from the bottom of the ranks to become the leader of the group.

A story about the "Japanese Dream" begins, as they work together as a team to reach stardom in the entertainment world!
description.pt-br:
"Se você realmente puder me tornar o centro do grupo... eu me casarei com você."

Mizuki Natsuno é a membra menos popular do grupo ídolo "Melty Strawberry". Koichi Okuda é a única pessoa no mundo que continua apoiando Mizuki. Duas pessoas que nunca deveriam estar conectadas acabam em um relacionamento cooperativo sob o mesmo teto, subindo da base da hierarquia para se tornarem os líderes do grupo.

Começa uma história sobre o “Sonho Japonês”, enquanto eles trabalham juntos como uma equipe para alcançar o estrelato no mundo do entretenimento!

title.en: I'm a Middle Schooler Becoming the Demon Lord

altTitles.en: I'm a Second Year Middle Schooler Becoming the Demon Lord
I'm Currently Becoming the Demon Lord

altTitles.ru: Я, Лорд демонов, становлюсь учеником средней школы

description.en: Fifteen-year old demon prince, Myoung Seong Joon. To become the demon lord he has attended a middleschool in the human realm and started the maturity ritual.
description.ru: 15-летний принц демонов Мён Сон Чжун дабы стать лордом демонов, начал посещать среднюю школу в человеческом мире, чтобы начать ритуал зрелости.

altTitles.ja: 終末トレインどこへいく？

altTitles.en: Train to the End of World

title.en: FPS de Shoshinsha Bokotte Real Fight ni Hattenshita Kekka w

altTitles.ja: FPSで初心者ボコってリアルファイトに発展した結果w

altTitles.en: After Beating a Noob in an FPS, He Wanted to Fight Me in Real Life LOL

altTitles.vi: Sau Khi Bị Tôi Bón Hành Trong Game, Có Đứa Hẹn Kèo Đánh Tôi!

altTitles.id: Hasil dari Mengalahkan seorang Pemula di FPS yang Berkembang Menjadi Pertarungan di RL haha

altTitles.ro: Luptând Cu Un Începător La Jocurile FPS

altTitles.es-la: Después de vencer a un novato en un FPS, ¡Quería pelear conmigo en la vida real jaja!

description.en:
After I beat a noob in an FPS, he challenged me to a fight in real life!?

I decided to go along with it just for fun, but when I got there, a cute girl was waiting for me!

This is a romcom featuring a scummy male lead and a feisty female lead!

(Source: [BookLive](https://booklive.jp/product/index/title_id/1564434/vol_no/001))
description.ja:
FPSで初心者をボコったらリアルファイトに誘われた！？
面白半分で行ってみるとそこにいたのは可愛い女の子！
クズ系主人公と、闘志マンマンのヒロインによる
ラブコメディ！？
未公開の前日章「とある1日」も追加しています！

description.en: Is he crazy? Or just the typical attention seeker? Lee Kwang-Jin, who doesn't understand the difference in people, and his Master Kwak No who's the one helping him to understand the differences of people. A warm human story of a student and his Master.
description.ko:
미친놈인가?
아니면 흔한 관심종자인가?

사람의 다름을 이해 못 하는 제자 이강진.
그리고 그걸 이해시켜주고자 하는 스승 곽노.
두 사제師弟의 따뜻한 휴먼스토리.

description.en: Halo, the best musician of the time, suffers a traffic accident on the way to the Grammy ceremony. And when he regains consciousness, he finds himself in the body of a little Korean boy named No Hae-il. He finds himself in a completely different place and time. He confirms that No Hae-il's English name is Halo and feels a strong destiny. Halo, who entered Hae-il, proves to be a musical genius at this time as well.

altTitles.ja: Minamike
みなみけ
南家

description.en:
*Minami-ke* ("The Minami Household") is a manga following the three Minami sisters, Haruka, Kana, and Chiaki in their lives at home and school. It's a funny manga that depicts how these characters interact with each other and their classmates. Although they are ordinary girls, their ordinary adventures are told in an extraordinary manner.
**Source:** MangaUpdates

Jinwoo Kim had been slaving as an assistant writer for 6 years with nothing to show for it. He quits his workplace. Later, he abruptly has a notification pop up and now he has scenes popping into his head and system prompts telling him he must be at a location to write. Maybe this is how he will become a star writer??
description.ko:
어느 날 갑자기 생긴 글 쓰는 능력,
보조작가로 구르던 나 김진우에게도 스타작가의 길이 열렸다! 가즈아~~!
.
.
[시스템 : 제한 시간 내에 랜덤 배정된 장소에서만 글쓰기 능력이 실현됩니다^^!
장소 : 한라산/제한 시간 : 20시간]
"...네?"(김진우/서울시)

description.en: Goyu possesses a unique ability: when he smells a scent associated with a memory, he can see past memories vividly. The problem is, whenever he catches a whiff of such a scent, his consciousness is pulled into the past, leaving his physical body frozen in place, dazed and unresponsive. One day, this ability almost leads to a disaster when Goyu is nearly hit by a car. Fortunately, Yoohan jumps in and saves him just in time. Goyu then discovers that when he is near Yoohan, the scents manifest as visible forms, allowing him to avoid getting lost in his memories.

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ Yǒu Bǎi Wàn Bèi Gōng Sù

description.en: After being reincarnated into the Tianwu Continent, Ye Yun activated the Multiverse Devouring System and received the reward of a million times attack speed in the beginner's gift package. From then on, he became an invincible powerhouse! As the saying goes, in the world of martial arts, speed is paramount. Do you think I was just picking my nose and cleaning my ears? In fact, I just executed thirty-five thousand people with a single sword strike and eighty-seven thousand people with a single sword swing, while also unleashing various boxing techniques and secret arts.

title.en: I'm in Trouble With My Best Friend's Daughter

altTitles.ja-ro: Shin'yuu no Musume ni Semarare Komatte imasu

altTitles.ja: 親友の娘に迫られ困っています

description.en: Kiyoharu's predictable everyday life comes to an abrupt end when his best friend's daughter suddenly shows up, declares that she'll be living with him, and demands he makes her his wife.

title.en: I Became the Youngest Member of Top Idol

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Retorno Como O Membro Mais Jovem

description.en: “25…that’s too old to become an idol.” Do Seohan, who got eliminated from the successful idol survival audition program ‘Stardust Project’. Giving up his dreams, he is trying to find his way working part-time jobs. When all of a sudden, he wakes up 8 years in the past after an accident. Right before the ‘Stardust Project’ started! As the youngest (but most experienced), can he make it to the final lineup this time?
description.id: Do Seohan, yang gagal dalam idol survival show terkenal “Stardust Project”, selalu dibayang-bayangi oleh mimpi masa lalunya. Tak pernah meraih kesuksesan, Seohan hanya bisa bekerja sambilan untuk melewati hari-harinya. Namun, akibat sebuah kejadian yang menimpanya, tiba-tiba ia terbangun dan kembali ke 8 tahun lalu, tepat sebelum “Stardust Project” dimulai! Jiwanya 8 tahun lebih tua dari kontestan lainnya, tapi sekarang ia yang termuda di antara mereka. Apakah kali ini Seohan akan berhasil debut sebagai idol?
description.ko:
"25살…그거 아이돌은 못하는 나이잖아요."
유명 서바이벌 아이돌 오디션 '스타더스트 프로젝트'에서 탈락했던 도서한.
꿈에 미련은 못버리고 현실과 타협한 채 알바를 전전하는데…눈을 떠보니 8년 전으로 돌아왔다.
그것도 '스타더스트 프로젝트'를 시작하기 직전으로!
막내가 된 (영혼만은) 최고 연장자, 이번에는 오디션에 합격해 아이돌 멤버가 될 수 있을까?
description.pt-br: Do Seohan, que fracassou no famoso programa de sobrevivência de idols "Stardust Project", é sempre assombrado por seus sonhos do passado. Sem nunca ter alcançado o sucesso, Seohan só consegue trabalhar em empregos de meio período para passar seus dias. No entanto, devido a um incidente que lhe aconteceu, ele acordou de repente e voltou a 8 anos atrás, logo antes do início do "Stardust Project"! Sua alma é 8 anos mais velha que a dos outros participantes, mas agora ele é o mais jovem entre eles. Será que Seohan conseguirá debutar como idol desta vez?

title.en: I'm Really Not the Evil God's Lackey

altTitles.en: I'm Really Not the Demon God's Lackey
I’m Really Not the Devil’s Lackey

altTitles.uk: Насправді я не слуга Злого Бога

altTitles.vi: Ta Thật Không Phải Tà Thần Chó Săn

description.en: Lin Jie is an otherworlder who manages a bookstore. He’s kind and always recommends soul-healing books for his dejected customers. Sometimes he’d even share his own works too. As time goes on, these customers start to respect him a lot. They bring simple local products every day to show their gratitude and ask for book recommendations. They even start telling tales of this ordinary shopkeeper. His respectful and cordial titles include “Hyena of the Evil God”, “Herald of the Flesh Gospel”, “Author of Cultes des Goules” and “Shepherd of the Stars”???
description.uk: Лінь Цзє – чужоземець з іншого світу, що став тепер звичайним власником книжкового магазину. Він доброзичливий і завжди готовий порекомендувати відвідувачам книги, що здатні зцілити їхні душі. Іноді, він ділиться і власними роботами. З часом, клієнти починають його дуже поважати. Вони щодня приносять йому маленькі сувеніри чи подарунки в знак подяки та просять у нього рекомендації щодо книги. Про цього звичайного крамаря навіть починають розповідати історії. Його з повагою та теплом звуть «Гієна Злого Бога», «Вісник Євангелія Плоті», «Автор Культу Упирів» та «Пастух Зірок».
description.zh: 穿越者林介经营着一家书店。他善良热情，总是向失意潦倒的客人们推荐治愈心灵的书籍，偶尔也会安利一下自己的拙作。久而久之，这些客人变得非常尊敬他，每天都会带来一些朴实的土特产报答他，向他请教推荐书目，并且向周边人也诉说着这个普通书店老板的事迹。他们尊敬而亲切地称呼他为——“邪神的鬣狗”、“血肉福音书的传播者”、“尸食教典仪的撰写者”、“群星的牧羊人”。“？？？”

title.en: Zettai BL ni Naru Sekai vs. Zettai BL ni Naritakunai Otoko

altTitles.en: A World Where Everything Definitely Becomes BL vs. The Man Who Definitely Doesn't Want To Be In A BL

altTitles.ja: 絶対BLになる世界VS絶対BLになりたくない男

altTitles.en: A Man Who Defies The World of BL

description.en: One day, the protagonist realizes that he lives inside a BL (Boys' Love) world. As he likes girls, he fights back against any hot guys that might draw near, but this is a BL world... he's still assailed with the sight of people in lovey-dovey situations one after another!

title.en: In This Life, the Greatest Star in the Universe

altTitles.en: I'm Going to Be a Big Star

description.en: Sun Woo-joo, an aspiring idol with shining talent, dedication, and passion, had only one shortcoming: "dancing." Having to give up on his lifelong dream of becoming an idol due to this one flaw, he was preparing for a different path in life when a miracle suddenly appeared! "I'll become a superstar brighter than anyone." His once lacking dance skills were no longer a problem. The UV Starship. Five perfectly prepared idols are finally ready with everything they need. A monstrous rookie is about to debut in the entertainment industry! Presenting 'The New Black.' This life, he's destined to be a cosmic superstar!

Alvida, the Demon Queen, was defeated by the Hero, but she will be allowed to stay alive under one condition, which is "be his wife?!".
___
Original comic posted by PeaCh88 on twitter.

[**Author's Twitter**](https://twitter.com/pcmaniac88)    
[**Patreon**](https://www.patreon.com/PeaCh88)
description.pt-br: Alvida, a Rainha Demônio, foi derrotada pelo Herói, mas ela poderá ficar viva sob uma condição, que é "ser sua esposa?!".

description.en: Mooyoung, a snobbish dreamer who wants to fight! But what are your wishes? 'Be a partner!'

title.en: Class no Bocchi Gal wo Omochikaeri Shite Seisokei Bijin ni Shite Yatta Hanashi

altTitles.ja: クラスのぼっちギャルをお持ち帰りして清楚系美人にしてやった話

altTitles.en: A Story Of Taking Home A Lonely Gal From My Class And Turning Her Into An Elegant Beauty

altTitles.zh: 收留孤身一人的同班辣妹，并使之化身清纯美女

altTitles.zh-ro: Shōuliú gūshēn yīrén de tóngbān làmèi, bìng shǐ zhī huàshēn qīngchún měinǚ

altTitles.ja-ro: Kurasu no Bocchi Gyaru o Omochikaeri shite Seisokei Bijin ni shiteyatta Hanashi

description.en: On a rainy night, Akira Akamori, a high school student about to transfer to a new school, saw his blonde classmate, Aoi Soutome, standing in the park drenched from the rain. “…I don’t have a home anymore.” Though Aoi was a complete stranger to him, Akira couldn’t leave a girl alone, so he took her home. “Thanks for the help.” “I-It’s fine…” When Akira heard about Aoi’s complicated situation, he decided to help her and let her live with him until he transferred to a new school. While confused by their new cohabitation arrangement, the two slowly grew close to each other. It is a love story of two people who repeatedly come together and drift apart, like a spinning record.
description.ja:
来年転校を控えている高校生の明護晃はある雨の日、近所の公園でずぶ濡れになっている金髪ギャルのクラスメイト、五月女葵を見かける。

「……私、帰る家がないの」

どう見てもワケアリの葵を放っておけず、自宅に連れ帰るのだが――

「お風呂、ありがとう」
「お、おう……」

葵の抱える複雑な事情を聞いた晃は人助けだと思い、転校までの間、そのまま一緒に生活をすることに。はじめて尽くしの同居生活に戸惑いながらも、二人はゆっくりと心の距離を近づけていき――。これは、出会いと別れを繰り返す二人の恋物語（ラブストーリー）。
description.pt-br: Uma vez ele ajudou uma garota da sua sala. Em uma tarde chuvosa, Akira Akamori, um colegial que acabou de mudar para uma nova escola, viu sua colega de sala loira, encharcada pela chuva em uma praça por perto. “… eu não tenho mais aonde morar.” Apesar da Aoi ser uma completa estranha para ele, ele não pode deixar a garota sozinha, então a levou para sua casa. “Obrigada pela ajuda.” “E-está tudo bem…”

altTitles.ja: 青山ケイハウス

description.en:
Park Tae Jun's exciting new work! An impure cohabitation!  
  
[Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000413)  
[Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/khouse/list?title_no=1502)

title.en: The Time Limited Baby Doctor Doesn’t Hide Her Smarts (Promo)

altTitles.ko: 시한부 아기 의원이 천재인 걸 안 숨김

altTitles.en: The Terminally Ill Baby Congressman Doesn’t Hide The Fact That She’s A Genius

description.en:
I woke up in my friend's favorite novel! I had limited time, but I was in a powerful body!

Just when I thought I was going back home,
I ended up stuck in this world again!

So, I made up my mind.
I don’t want to live a life of struggle!

In order to do that:
"Dad, I'll help you reclaim your memories. So help me!"

In order to survive as the greatest doctor, I need the greatest person to protect me! My dad!
Wake up, dad!

* * *

I signed a contract with my dad in exchange for helping him find his memories.

On the way, I helped out a girl, as well as my younger uncle.

While also saving my big uncle, and cousin.

"I'm going home!"
"No, don't go, Big sis!"
"My daughter's crying, so I forbid you from leaving."
"I'm going!"

Oh my goodness!
Everyone’s trying to make me stay.

But I’m dead set on throwing everything away and leaving!

Can I really stay away for long?

title.en: Koi De Tokeru Girudo Za Lily

altTitles.ja: 恋でとけるギルド・ザ・リリー

description.en:
Former Host No.1 – Asuka Loses Her Throne To Rookie Kyouji!

Asuka, who has always held the No.1 Host position for many years, was suddenly usurped by Kyouji, a brand new rookie, in a spectacular way. Determined to regain the No.1 position, Asuka tries her best but continuously fails, even having to ask Kyouji for help to solve the problem...

Newly emerging typical bad boy No.1 vs Arrogant good boy former No.1 - 
Romantic night love story for crazy fans officially begins!

With her fierce eyes and sharp impression, and wary of everyone, 'Ahn Se-young' is a woman to watch out for.
Everyone is cautious around her, but a lone boy stands in front of her.
"I like you, go out with me!"
"......What?!"
Se-young is taken aback at the sudden confession of love, but this was just the beginning...
The tug-of-war between 'Ahn Se-young', who shows an unexpected side to her as you get closer, and 'Nam Ho-yeol', the straightforward guy who tries to break down her impenetrable facade, begins now!
description.ko:
사나운 눈매와 날카로운 인상으로 주변 사람들에게 경계를 받고 있는 요주의 그녀 '안세영'.
모두가 경계심을 놓지 못할 때 그녀의 앞에 한 남자애가 마주선다.
"나 너 좋아해, 나랑 사귀자!"
"......뭐?!"
난데없는 사랑고백에 진땀이 빠지는 세영, 하지만 이건 시작에 불과했으니...
가까이 다가갈수록 반전의 모습을 보이는 그녀 '안세영'과
그 모습을 빈틈없이 파고 들려는 직진남 '남호열'의 줄다리기가 지금 시작된다!

altTitles.ja: シロップ PURE おねロリ百合アンソロジー

description.en:
Cover illustration: En Morikura
1. Otonaninaritai (大人になりたい) by Hamuro Kei
2. Yakusoku (やくそく) by Maeya Susumu
3. V to Hatsukoi (vと初恋) by Yuzuki Ryota
4. Suriel (スーリール) by Tsuzura Ryo
5. Ohayou kara Oyasumi made (おはようからおやすみまで) by Mikan Uji
6. Moto JK to mi JK (元JKと未JK) by Tachi
7. CANDY GUILTY (CANDY GUILTY) by Yoshidamaru Yuu
8. Para ni Kiss (パラにキス) by Akitsu Kio
9. Tsumugu no Mahou (ツムグの魔法) by Itou Hachi
10. Kodomo no Mama de (こどものままで) by Iwami Kiyoko

altTitles.th: บันทึกครัวค่ายทหาร

description.en: Korea's representative dirt spoon, Kang Sung-jae, an opportunity to become a legendary cook who has come like a ray of light in an uneasy military life!
description.ko:
대한민국 대표 흙수저, 강성재. 
불안하기만 한 군생활에 한줄기 빛처럼 다가온 전설의 취사병이 될 기회!

---

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/drama/cp-the-legend/list?title_no=2216)
description.ru:
Кан Сон Чжэ, гражданин Кореи. Шанс стать легендарным поваром, который лучом света приблизился к непростой военной жизни!

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/drama/cp-the-legend/list?title_no=2216)
description.th:
ผมเป็นทหารใหม่ที่ถูกส่งไปประจำห้องครัว เรื่องมันควรจะธรรมดาใช่ไหมครับ ถ้าผมไม่ดันเห็นจอประหลาดที่หน้าตาเหมือนจอเกมปรากฏขึ้นตรงหน้า แถมมีแต่ผมคนเดียวที่เห็นซะด้วย?!

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/drama/cp-the-legend/list?title_no=2216)
description.zh-hk:
21歲的江成宰是大韓民國典型的窮二代，辛苦維持生計之際收到了入伍通知。惴惴不安的新兵生活突然出現了一道曙光，只要跟著只有他才能看到的「遊戲教學」破任務升級，就有機會成為軍中的傳奇廚師！

altTitles.en: Daily Lives of Tadano Technical High School

title.en: Wakeari Hakushaku-sama to Keiyaku Kekkon Shitara, Gijou (Roku-sai) no Keiyaku Haha ni Natte Shimaimashita.

altTitles.ja: 訳あり伯爵様と契約結婚したら、義娘（六歳）の契約母になってしまいました。

description.en:
Maria Martini, the daughter of a baroness, is contractually married to Count Ricardo Ricœur for one year only. 

Ricardo's wife has been unfaithful to him and left him, and he has been repeatedly honey-trapped by women who want to marry him again. Maria's role was supposed to be a cover to protect him, but during the course of their life together, Ricardo's behavior became strange. The first thing that comes to mind is that Ricardo's stepdaughter, Lydia, is very interested in her new mommy.

A contractual marriage begins a too-happy married life.

The one and only weapon to take down the Dark Lord.
The Holy Sword.
And the Warrior who lost it…
Warrior seeks and seeks until he finds the Holy Sword.
10 years, 20 years, 30 years… From the Dragon’s Nest till the Spirit King’s Hideout
The Warrior seeks the Holy Sword still to this day.

altTitles.ja: サキュバスがやってきたお話

altTitles.en: The Story of a Succubus Who Came to the Human World

description.en: The story of a Succubus who comes to the human world to absorb life force energy. Accidentally, she lives as a child in a strange man's house.

title.en: Since I don't know about it, should we part ways, Your Majesty?

description.en:
Due to a carriage accident, Lumiere suffers from amnesia. 
While searching for her memories, she discovers a warning in her diary.

[Do not fall for him.]

At that time, a man claiming to be her lover appears.
“I know everything about you, even the parts you don't know yourself.”

This man, who doesn't exist in her memories.
But she finds herself increasingly attracted to him…

… Were we really lovers? Why did we break up?
Is approaching the truth really the right thing for me?
description.ko:
마차 사고로 인해 기억상실증에 걸린 르미에.
기억을 찾기 위해 본 일기장에서 경고를 발견한다.

[그를 사랑해선 안 돼.]

그때, 그녀의 연인이었다고 주장하는 남자가 찾아왔다.
"난 당신 스스로도 모르는 부분까지 전부 다, 알고 있으니까."

분명 기억 속엔 존재하지 않는 그.
하지만 그에게 점점 끌리는 자신을 발견하는데...

…진짜 우린 연인이었을까? 왜 헤어진 걸까?
진실에 다가서는 것이, 정말로 나를 위한 일이 맞을까?

altTitles.en: Convenience Store Worker From Another World

description.en: The protagonist Chan, who was looking for a part-time job after his previous company went bankrupt, coincidentally discovers a convenience store. Lured by the very high hourly wage, he decides to become a part-timer from that day. But the customers who come in seem a bit strange. Vampires, kobolds, and even succubi??
description.pt-br: O protagonista Chan, que estava procurando um trabalho de meio período depois que sua empresa anterior faliu, descobre por acaso uma loja de conveniência. Atraído pelo salário por hora extremamente alto, ele decide começar a trabalhar lá a partir daquele dia. Mas os clientes que entram parecem um pouco estranhos. Vampiros, kobolds e até succubus??

altTitles.fr: Notes de ma réincarnation dans un autre monde

altTitles.ja: 異世界転生騒動記

altTitles.en: Record of My Reincarnation in Another World

description.en:
In the Kingdom of Mauricia, Bard Cornelius has fallen ill, and the reason is because two different people have been reborn into his body.

He has his own personality as "Bard," and there are two other personalities too! A miserly feudal warlord, Sadatoshi Okasanai, and a nerdy high school student, Masaharu Oka, who has a fetish for animal ears!

Three souls as one; he is able to fight, start his own business and manage the lands with such competence as if he's using cheat codes...! 

A fun isekai fantasy!

---
- Official English in form of online chapters by [Alpha Manga](https://www.alpha-manga.com/manga/552000104)
- Official English in form of volumes (digital / printed) by [One Peace Books](https://www.onepeacebooks.com/jt/MultiMind.html)

title.en: Shoukoku no Altair Gaiden - Toukoku no Subaru

altTitles.en: The Pleiades of the Island Nation

altTitles.ja: 将国のアルタイル嵬伝 嶌国のスバル

altTitles.vi: Sao Thất Nữ nơi Đảo quốc

description.en: The curtain rises on an Oriental Reconquista spin-off of Kato Kotono's "Shoukoku no Altair", set far to the east of Rumeliana is the once peaceful and beautiful island nation of Kusanagi, which has been annexed by the larger country of Cinili and fallen into ruin.

Even if a musician dies, he never dies. It's just covered. Singer-songwriter Kim Han-seok, who became a legend in Korea with just a guitar... Waking up as a college student in the streaming era 30 years after his death!

altTitles.ja: お兄ちゃんはおしまい!

description.en:
Mahiro Oyama was just a normal erotic-game loving dude...until he woke up one morning as a woman! Turns out his mad-scientist little sister, Mihari, tried out one of her new experiments on him...with a disastrous outcome, as far as Mahiro's concerned! But Mihari is as determined to study him as he is determined to go back to his shut-in, game-playing life, and one thing's for sure...life is going to get a whole lot weirder from here on out!

*5th place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga  
  
- **Retail:** (Direct Retail From the Mangaka)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/0e9KPgq.png) [Official Melon Books](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/circle/index.php?circle_id=3753)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/t9hf4kQ.png) [Official Toranoana](https://ec.toranoana.shop/tora/ec/cot/circle/2UPA116P847KdC6Rd687/all/)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/lGJEbPa.png) [Official DLSite](https://www.dlsite.com/home/circle/profile/=/maker_id/RG40614.html) (jp)
description.pt-br: Oyama Mahiro, um dia acordou como uma garota graças a sua irmã que colocou uma droga em sua comida, após ter visto eroges a noite toda. Um mangá de comédia sobre um garoto que se transformou em uma mulher.

altTitles.ja: 恋喰少女

description.en: High school student Ooishi Kyou is afraid of women. Suddenly, five girls confessed to him. Among them, four are creatures called Koibami - beings that devour human romantic feelings. If he has his romantic feelings eaten by these girls, he will never be able to love again. However, he cannot abandon the feelings of the one who confessed to him for real - Kyou decides to find the one he truly loves among the five!
description.ja:
本物の恋心を、あなたは見抜けるか。

女性を恐れる男子高校生・大石饗。彼に突然告白してきた、5人の少女。そのうち4人は、人間の恋愛感情を喰らう生物「恋喰（こいばみ）」。彼女たちに恋愛感情を食べられると、二度と恋をすることができなくなってしまう。ただ、本当の告白をした1人の気持ちを、見捨てるわけにはいかない――饗は覚悟を決め、5人の中から、本命の1人を見つけだすことを決意する！
description.es-la: Oishi Kyou es un chico que siempre ha tenido un fuerte miedo a las chicas. Cuando comienza su primer día de clases en la preparatoria, se ve abrumado al recibir confesiones de amor por parte de cinco chicas diferentes. Sin embargo, descubre que cuatro de ellas son en realidad chicas ‘Devoradoras de Amor’, chicas que buscan seducir a los hombres para alimentarse de sus sentimientos, y sus presas favoritas son los sentimientos del ‘Primer Amor’, gracias a cierta persona el Protagonista sabe que 4 chicas de primer año son ‘Devoradoras de Amor’ así que, dentro de estas 5 chicas hay una que se confesó realmente a Oishi, así que se propone a encontrar a la única chica entre las 5 que realmente lo ama, todo sea antes de que devoren sus sentimientos.
description.pt-br:
O estudante do ensino médio, Kyo Oishi, tem medo de mulheres.
 
De repente, cinco garotas se declaram para ele. Entre elas, quatro são criaturas chamadas Devoradoras de Amor - seres que devoram sentimentos românticos humanos. Se ele tiver seus sentimentos românticos consumidos por essas garotas, ele nunca mais será capaz de amar novamente.
 
No entanto, ele não pode abandonar os sentimentos daquela que se declarou para ele de verdade - Kyo decide encontrar a única que realmente ama ele entre as cinco! Começa uma comédia romântica de suspense que balança o cérebro!

title.en: Story of a Certain Yuri Couple

altTitles.ja: とある百合カップルの話
霧尾ファンクラブ

description.en:
Aimi Miyoshi and Nami Sometani. Two high school girls who often find themselves talking about their own classmate, Kirio-kun.
This unrequited romcom story of those frenemies depicts their daily life, peppered with a love progress that seemingly won’t go anywhere yet.
description.ja:
女子高生・三好藍美（みよしあいみ）と染谷波（そめたになみ）。二人の間で話題にのぼるのは、いつだって同じクラスの「霧尾（きりお）くん」のこと。
友人でありライバルでもある二人の日常を描く、ラブまではまだたどり着けそうにない一方通行ラブコメディー。

title.en: I Have Nine Quadrillion Simp Gold Coins

altTitles.vi: Ta Có 90 Tỷ Tiền Liếm Cẩu!

altTitles.en: I Have 90 Billion Licking Gold Coins

description.en: Down-and-out university student Chen Yuan, devotedly pursues Goddess Lin Shutong for three years, gets kicked in the face. In his grief, he accidentally activates the “Licking Dog System” with a memory of 90 trillion Licking Dog Money, solely for licking women. The more you spend, the more you get back, and you can also obtain various attribute bonuses, transforming into a little superhero. It's called the Licking Dog System, but do I really want to be a licking dog? As long as I lick enough, I'll be the king. As long as I prove my love with enough money, I can turn the goddess into my licking dog! At this moment, Chen Yuan, who has undergone a great awakening, embarks on his life as a rich and licking dog.

altTitles.ja: 絵筆と黒絹

description.en: One day, an application to be a model for a beauty portrait arrives. A shocking truth is revealed when old friends reunite for the first time in many years.

altTitles.ja: 夏とレモンとオーバーレイ

description.en: A struggling voice actress who goes by the name of Yunimaru is barely making ends meet. Constantly thinking about when she will escape her miserable life, she's contacted by Konno Sayaka—a beautiful and successful woman working for a big company—with a job offer: to read a farewell letter at her own funeral. While grappling with whether or not to accept such an absurd job offer, Sayaka makes her a proposal that she can't refuse. Now with an opportunity to escape her situation, Yunimaru also finds herself aiding Sayaka in the completion of her letter.
